product_name: Sahara Sailor Water Bottle with Time Marker, 17oz/25/32oz, Motivational…
description: STAY HYDRATED ALL DAY: Adults should maintain adequate daily water intake. Our 32 oz water bottle is perfect for your daily requirement! Motivational water bottle with time markings help you stay hydrated. Not only can you easily track your daily water intake, but you can also encourage yourself to drink enough.  TRITAN & BPA FREE: Mevoly reusable water bottles are made of Tritan, the best safe and durable plastic for bottles. This plastic water bottle won't generate odors, chemicals, or unpleasant taste. Water bottles safety is our first concern.  LEAKPROOF & EASILY OPEN: No need to care about leaks at all. Our sports water bottle flip-top lid is designed with a safety lock. The wide mouth is easy to clean and add fruit or ice cubes! It's also fits in a car cup holder (No Straw).  STRAP UPGRADED DESIGN: Our gym water bottle features the newest design: Detachable carry handle strap connector and thickened & dense nylon carry strap! The 1 litre motivational water bottle with time markings is a practical and aesthetically pleasing necessity for your daily life.  LIGHTWEIGHT FASHION DESIGN: This bpa free water bottle is lightweight. We come with a cleaning brush and nice packaging. Great for school, gym, workout, running, hiking, camping, and any other indoor or outdoor sports activities, it is an ideal perfect gift for men, women, girls and boys

latest_reviews.review: I scrolled through so many water bottles, looking at their prices and features. Initially I wanted an insulated bottle, however I chose this one for a few reasons. (1) spill proof flip top with large mouth opening and no straw, so easier cleaning IMO. (2) it comes with a strap which I wanted and plenty of colours plus it’s BPA free. (3) most importantly, the timing measurement feature on the bottle literally helps me with my goal to KEEP drinking my water, which I have been consistently achieving!  Glad I chose this one.
Simple design, no leakage, great waterflow, nice look.
The 32-ounce capacity is perfect for staying hydrated throughout the day.
